channel.title: AI-Pulse - Stock Market & Finance
channel.description: Stock Market & Finance news from AI-Pulse

item.title: Microsoft’s stock is trading at a rare discount to Alphabet’s, as the ‘Magnificent Seven’ reshuffle intensifies
item.description: The artificial-intelligence trade is upending the long-standing pecking order of Big Tech valuations as investors hunt for the next big winners and losers.

item.title: Deere’s stock is having its best month in 50 years, as the tractor maker rides the AI boom
item.description: Deere’s stock surged further into record territory Thursday after a big earnings beat and a bullish outlook for full-year sales growth.

item.title: Wayfair’s stock sinks, as investors worry expansion plans will hurt profits
item.description: Wayfair’s stock was suffering its worst postearnings reaction in nearly four years, after the company unexpectedly swung to a net loss for the latest quarter and warned that profit margins may narrow.
